snippet: The critics are weighing in on the new iPad, which could easily have been called the iPad 3 if Apple wasn't trying so hard to be less predictable. The consensus seems to be that this is no radical reinvention, just an evolution of the iPad 2. In...
abstract: The critics are weighing in on the new iPad, which could easily have been called the iPad 3 if Apple wasn't trying so hard to be less predictable. The consensus seems to be that this is no radical reinvention, just an evolution of the iPad 2. In other words, it's a bit predictable.

headline.main: Daily Report: A Roundup of iPad Reviews
